TopicTitle: My Daily KSP Synopsis: First Lander...On KERBIN!?

Articles.Content:
I built a lander today. When i put it onto the launchpad i proudly throttled up and punched that spacebar.

I went to the upper atmosphere (Stratosphere) and kicked it into PhysWarp x2, where in a few seconds i thrusted up and down repeatedly until i hit the ground smoothly.

This is what achievement feels like in ksp.

Danger is my mid' name.
